short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick view of toomuchlag's Le Anime collection souls on Nifty Gateway

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Le Anime extension for Chrome allows you to swap the Open Edition preview on Nifty Gateway, and see your soul directly on Nifty. A one click solution to quickly replace and see what character is attributed to each edition number, to facilitate trade on the platform.  

Works in:
- Le Anime's Marketplace
- Le Anime's Item Detail
- Profiles containing Le Anime nifites

How to use: 
1) Wait for the page to fully load (important).
2) Click on the extension icon.
3) Click on "Show Souls" button in marketplace and profile to reveal the souls and in the item detail, the soul will be displayed along with its properties on icon click in the extension's popup.

Le Anime by toomuchlag.
